mapper.select: select lin.user_id as userId, lin.order_no as orderNo, lin.periodical_id as periodicalId,lin.subscribe_nums as subNums,lin.order_status as oStatus,lin.address_id as addressId,lin.contacter_name as contacterName,lin.contacter_telephone as contacterTelephone,lin.receive_address as receiveAddress,lin.receive_postcode as receivePostCode,pd.distribute_nums as distributNum,pd.distribute_status,pd.id as distributId from (select oi.user_id,oi.order_no,oi.periodical_id,oi.subscribe_nums,oi.order_status,ai.address_id, ai.contacter_name,ai.contacter_telephone,ai.receive_address,ai.receive_postcode from order_info oi,address_info ai,user_info ui where ui.ref_id=ai.ref_id and ai.extend_1 = oi.order_no ) as lin left join -- where oi.user_id=ui.user_id and ui.ref_id=ai.ref_id and ai.extend_1 = oi.order_no ) as lin left join periodical_distribut pd on lin.address_id=pd.address_id and lin.order_no=pd.ref_id where lin.order_no=#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select oi.order_no as orderNo,oi.already_pay_amount as aPayAmount,DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as submitTime,oi.order_status as oStatus, oi.periodical_year as pYear,oi.subscribe_nums as subNums,oi.user_id as userId,pi.periodical_cn_name as pCnName, DATE_FORMAT(oi.audit_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as auditTime, pi.cycle as cycle,pi.in_fix_price as iFprice,oi.amount as oAmount,ri.reader_name as readerName,pi.in_fix_price as iFprice,p.periodical_issue_no as pIsNo, p.periodical_state as pState,p.periodical_id as periodicalId from order_info oi,periodical_info pi,user_info ui,reader_info ri ,periodical p where oi.periodical_id=pi.periodical_id and oi.user_id=ui.user_id and ui.ref_id=ri.reader_id and p.periodical_id=pi.periodical_id and p.periodical_state='FI'
